name: Arco de la Calzada
address: Blvd. Adolfo López Mateos, León, Gto.
description: Iconic archway that serves as the symbol of León, built in 1893 to commemorate the city's industrial progress.

name: Explanada del Estadio León
address: Blvd. Adolfo López Mateos 1801, León, Gto.
description: Vibrant public space outside the León soccer stadium with food vendors and entertainment.

name: Museo de Arte e Historia de Guanajuato
address: Prol. Calzada de los Héroes 908, León, Gto.
description: Premier cultural center showcasing regional art and history through interactive exhibits.

name: Zona Piel (Leather District)
description: World-famous district specializing in leather goods with hundreds of shops and factories.

name: Plaza Principal (Main Square)
description: The heart of León with beautiful gardens, the Cathedral Basilica, and frequent cultural events.

name: Zoológico de León
description: Modern zoo with over 1,200 animals from 180 species in naturalistic habitats.

name: Parque Metropolitano
description: Massive urban park with lakes, bike paths, playgrounds, and recreational facilities.

name: Plaza del Zapato
description: Specialized shopping center dedicated to footwear with hundreds of shoe stores and factories.
